Content:: Giorgio Oppi (8 February 1940[1] – 26 July 2022) was an Italian politician. He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy until 12 May 2009.[2] Oppi died in July 2022, at the age of 82.[3]  This article about an Italian politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
